scripts.aws-all: npm run aws-pkg && npm run aws-deploy && npm run aws-stack-resources
scripts.aws-pkg: aws cloudformation package --template-file C4/test.yaml --output-template-file serverless-output.yaml --s3-bucket test-bucket-codesmith
scripts.aws-deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file serverless-output.yaml --stack-name testApp --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
